meanings.sent1: The hexadic dice has six sides.
meanings.sent2: The hexadic pattern repeated every sixth step.
meanings.sent3: The hexadic puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her hexadic necklace had six shimmering gems.
meanings.sent5: The hexadic shape resembled a perfect hexagon.

meanings.definition: Consisting of six parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The hexadic flower had six vibrant petals.
meanings.sent2: The hexadic team consisted of six skilled players.
meanings.sent3: The hexadic cake was divided into six delicious slices.
meanings.sent4: His hexadic toolbox contained exactly six tools.
meanings.sent5: The hexadic rainbow displayed six beautiful colors.

meanings.definition: A system or structure based on the number six.
meanings.sent1: The board game was a hexadic with six main sections.
meanings.sent2: The calendar followed a hexadic with six-week cycles.
meanings.sent3: The classroom seating arrangement formed a hexadic of six desks.
meanings.sent4: The music composition had a hexadic with six distinct movements.
meanings.sent5: The building's design followed a hexadic with six pillars.
